definitions.definition: a country; an area of land

examples.text: It was the first time I had set foot on African soil.

He was the first Canadian to win **on home/native soil** *(= in Canada)*.

wordOrigin: noun late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French, perhaps representing Latin solium ‘seat’, by association with solum ‘ground’.
